name: Ch14ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Ross;Ugh...|It's so HOT out here!|How much longer do we have to march through this desert?
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|The desert sun feels magnificent, doesn't it, lad?|Nothing like a good scorching to get the blood pumping!
speak;Ross;Are you serious?|I'm practically melting here!|How are you not bothered by this heat?

speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|When you've spent as many years adventuring as I have,|you learn to embrace the elements rather than fight them!|Heat, cold, rain, or shine—it's all part of the grand adventure!
speak;Ross;Well, I'm not "embracing" anything except the idea of finding some shade.|My axe handle is so hot I can barely hold it!|And my water supply is already half gone...
speak;Dozla;You youngsters today!|Always looking for the easy path!|In my day, we'd march through deserts twice as hot as this|with nothing but our axes and our laughter to keep us company!
speak;Ross;That doesn't sound very smart...|No offense.|I just think there has to be a better way to deal with this heat.
speak;Ross;Maybe I could wet my headband?|Or find some desert plants that hold water?|Dad once told me about fighters who would wear wet cloths under their armor in hot weather...
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|You're overthinking it, my boy!|The heat is only as bothersome as you allow it to be!|Mind over matter, as Lady L'Arachel would say!
speak;Ross;Easy for you to say!|You're not the one who's going to pass out from heatstroke!
speak;Dozla;Hmm...|You know, maybe I can help you after all!|I've been saving something special for an occasion just like this!
speak;Ross;Really?|What is it?|A magic potion that cools you down?|A special desert cloak?
speak;Ross;An... axe?|How is another axe supposed to help me with the heat?
speak;Dozla;Not just any axe!|This beauty is enchanted with water magic!|Lady L'Arachel had one of her clerics bless it after we rescued them from an oasis temple many moons ago!
speak;Ross;Water magic?|So it can cool me down?|That's amazing!|How does it work?
speak;Dozla;Simply activate the enchantment and a refreshing mist will surround you!|Cool as a mountain stream in the dead of summer!
speak;Ross;Activate it how?|Is there a command word or something?
speak;Dozla;GWAH HA HA!|Of course there is!|Though I can't quite remember what it was...
speak;Ross;What?|You don't remember?|Then how am I supposed to use it?
speak;Dozla;That's part of the adventure, lad!|Figure it out!|Try different words!|Swing it in different patterns!|The journey of discovery is half the fun!
speak;Ross;So you're giving me an axe that might help with the heat,|but I have to guess how to make it work?|While we're marching through this scorching desert?!
speak;Dozla;EXACTLY!|Gwah ha ha!|Nothing builds character like a good puzzle in trying circumstances!|Lady L'Arachel would be proud of my mentorship!
speak;Dozla;Gwag ha ha!|Keep trying, lad!|You're bound to get it eventually!|Or perhaps the axe responds to actions rather than words?|Try spinning it over your head!
speak;Ross;Nothing happened!|Gah!|This is even more frustrating than the heat!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Your father would be proud of your perseverance!|Keep at it!|The satisfaction when you finally activate it will be worth all the effort!
speak;Ross;Wait a minute...|Is this even really enchanted?|Or are you just having a laugh at my expense?
speak;Dozla;Of course it's enchanted!|I wouldn't joke about such a thing!|Though watching you dance around with that axe trying different words|is quite entertaining!|GWAH HA HA!
speak;Ross;I'm going to figure this out if it's the last thing I do!|And when I do,|you'll be sorry for laughing at me!
speak;Dozla;That's the spirit, lad!|GWAH HA HA!|Adventure! Challenge! Perseverance!|These are the things that forge a true warrior!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Keep trying, lad!|We've got many more miles of desert ahead of us!|Plenty of time to solve the mystery!
